channel.title: G zipping
channel.description:
umm i heard i gotta g zip models :s
where can find that so i can g zip these models i found... and once i have g zipped them what do i do next??????
so there in the client....
thx for ya help

item.title: G zipping
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2u pwnage2u
item.description:
@pwnage2u wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:5, topic:217808”]are you sure?, because i double checked and its there when you select compression type.

Did you download the exe version of 7-zip?[/quote]

i downloaded BETA verison top 1 and yea it wont even let me gzip .dat files aka model files.
FOUND ITZ

Read full topic

item.title: G zipping
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2u pwnage2u
item.description:
@pwnage2u wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:3, topic:217808”]7-zip is an excellent tool it compresses to g-zip fast and eaisly!!

What you do is -

  1. goto http://www.7-zip.org/download.html
  2. Once you install it, find the file you want to gz
  3. right click the file you want to compress
  4. Scroll down to 7-zip > click add to archive
  5. From there you can easily select the type of format you want (incldes gz)
  6. Click ok and whaa laa!!!

hope it helps :)[/quote]

i dont see no gz option :S
there is only 7zip
tar
zip

where do i find gz ???

Read full topic

item.title: G zipping
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

7-zip is an excellent tool it compresses to g-zip fast and eaisly!!

What you do is -

  1. goto http://www.7-zip.org/download.html
  2. Once you install it, find the file you want to gz
  3. right click the file you want to compress
  4. Scroll down to 7-zip > click add to archive
  5. From there you can easily select the type of format you want (incldes gz)
  6. Click ok and whaa laa!!!

hope it helps

Read full topic
